abstracts.cdata!:
The Agricultural Sector Management
            Project will assist in strengthening public sector
            institutions to deliver key services and to formulate
            agricultural policy through building their capacity to
            manage, analyze and implement programs. Also, the project
            will support essential reform programs in the areas of
            budget rationalization, pricing and policy analysis,
            parastatals, and monitoring the agriculture sector
            adjustment program. This will be achieved by programs to
            support budget rationalization, improvement of policy making
            and policy implementation. The strengthening of parastatal
            oversight agencies and support to the National Cereals and
            Produce Board (NCPB) to upgrade financial and stock
            management and food security.  Also provided will be
            technical assistance to other selected parastatals and
            training of staff in the areas of economics, management,
            finance, accounting, computers, and technical skills.
